code:
json
{
  "name": "todo-list-app",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "Todo List Application with React, Node.js, Express, MongoDB and Cypress",
  "main": "server.js",
  "scripts": {
    "start": "node server.js",
    "dev": "concurrently \"npm run start\" \"npm run client\"",
    "build": "tsc && cd client && npm run build",
    "client": "cd client && npm start",
    "test": "jest",
    "test:cypress": "cypress run",
    "test:e2e": "cypress run --spec cypress/e2e",
    "predeploy": "npm run build",
    "deploy": "gh-pages -d build"
  },
  "keywords": [],
  "author": "Your Name",
  "license": "MIT",
  "dependencies": {
    "@types/react": "^17.0.34",
    "@types/react-dom": "^17.0.9",
    "body-parser": "^1.19.0",
    "cors": "^2.8.5",
    "express": "^4.17.1",
    "mongoose": "^5.10.15",
    "react": "^17.0.2",
    "react-dom": "^17.0.2",
    "react-router-dom": "^5.2.0",
    "tailwindcss": "^2.2.19",
    "typescript": "^4.2.3"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@types/jest": "^27.0.1",
    "@types/node": "^14.14.35",
    "@types/react-router-dom": "^5.1.7",
    "@types/tailwindcss": "^2.2.8",
    "cypress": "^9.4.0",
    "gh-pages": "^3.2.3",
    "jest": "^27.5.1",
    "react-scripts": "^4.0.3",
    "ts-jest": "^27.0.3",
    "ts-node": "^10.2.1",
    "typescript-styled-plugin": "^0.4.4"
  },
  "cypress": {
    "specPattern": "cypress/integration/**/*.spec.js"
  },
  "resolutions": {
    "@types/react": "^17.0.34"
  },
  "husky": {
    "hooks": {
      "pre-commit": "npm run test"
    }
  }
}
